caseTitle: Khalid Mehmood v. Chaklala Cantonment Board through its CEO & others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Article 188 of the Constitution of Pakistan and the Supreme Court Rules envisage only one review of any judgment pronounced or any order made by the Court. A second review petition, whatever name is given to it including the “curative review”, is not maintainable under Article 188 of the Constitution read with the Supreme Court Rules.
